title: Mafia 2 God Mode
description:
If you don't have cheat engine you will need it for this to work

God mode set-up..instructions.. first add this to your cheat engine folder
(in your documents folder should say my cheats folder or something like that) 

now start the game then open up cheat engine and load up mafia II.exe it should ask you if you want to load associated files//click yes// 

now if window didnt open(it should) click //advanced// on lower left corner and it will..

the one with (mov eax,[ecx+10] ) change to (mov eax,[ecx+40]) 

and change this (mov eax,[eax+0C] ) to this (mov eax,[eax+1C] )

 now aside from long falls you will have unlimited ammo and unlimited health..just in case hard is too hard..have fun :)



p.s cheat engine download link
 <a href="
http://mirror3.cheatengine.org/download/d1/CheatEngine64.exe" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://mirror3.cheatengine.org/download/d1/CheatEngine64.exe</a>
